features: Built-in IR LED; Built-in Mechanical ICR; Day/Night; Motion Detection; Built-in Microphone; Built-in Speaker; Built-in Infrared Illuminator; Privacy Masking; SD Card Local Storage
dviewcamsoftwarefunctions: • Remote management/control of up to 32 cameras • Viewing of up to 32 cameras on one screen • Supports all management functions provided in web interface • Scheduled motion triggered or manual recording options
eventmanagement: • Motion detection • PIR motion detection • Event notification and upload snapshots/video clips via HTTP, SMTP, or FTP • Supports multiple HTTP, SMTP, and FTP servers • Multiple event notifications • Multiple recording methods for easy backup
securityfeatures: Administrator and user group protection; Password authentication; HTTP and RTSP digest encryption
operatingsystemcompatibility: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows 7/Vista/XP/2000, Apple MAC OSX 10.3 or above, Linux, Unix; Browsers: Internet Explorer, Firefox, Netscape, Opera
externaldeviceinterface: • 10/100 BASE-TX Ethernet port (with PoE for DCS-2210 only) • 802.11n wireless (DCS-2230 only) • 1 DI / 1 DO • microSD card slot
remotemanagement: • Configuration accessible via web browser • Take snapshots/video clips and save to local hard drive or NAS via web browser
videocompression: • H.264/MPEG-4/MJPEG simultaneous format compression • JPEG for still images
protocols: TCP/IP; UDP; ICMP; DHCP; NTP; DNS; DDNS; SMTP; FTP; HTTP; HTTPS; PPPoE; UPnP; RTP; RTSP; RTCP; IP; 3GPP; IGMP
imagefeatures: • Configurable image size, quality, frame rate, and bit rate • Time stamp and text overlays • Configurable motion detection windows • 3 configurable privacy mask zones • Configurable white balance, shutter speed, brightness, saturation, contrast, and sharpness
networkprotocols: • IPv4 • TCP/IP • UDP • ICMP • DHCP Client • NTP Client (D-Link) • DNS Client • DDNS Client (D-Link) • SMTP Client • FTP Client • HTTP / HTTPS • Samba Client • PPPoE • UPnP Port Forwarding • RTP / RTSP/ RTCP • IP filtering • 3GPP • IGMP • ONVIF-Compliant
certificationsstandards: CE; CE LVD; FCC (Class B); ICES-003; C-Tick
